sections.title: Error Use Case
paragraphs: A generic internal error type, which is not intended to be used directly.

description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
name.example: A generic internal error type, which is not intended to be used directly.
name.defaultContent: A generic internal error type, which is not intended to be used directly.

description: An integer representing the HTTP status code.
